channel.title: Banning Host: Flooding
channel.description:
[code]BANNING HOST 78.146.10*.*50 (flooding) ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10135 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10136 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10202 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10203 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10204 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10205 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10206 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10207 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*50:10208 ClientHandler: Rejected 78.146.10*.*0:10222[/code]
This is my friend trying to log on. He can log in once, then when he logs out and tries to log back in, it Bans him for flooding.
Anyone know the solution?

item.title: Banning Host: Flooding
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

In the Server class I believe, just look for “BANNING HOST” and delete the code where it bans the user.
